mapper.select: SELECT U.*, P.* FROM Partner P JOIN User U ON P.user_id = U.user_id WHERE P.approved=1 and U.user_name =#{user_name} or U.name=#{name}

SELECT U.*, P.* FROM Partner P JOIN User U ON P.user_id = U.user_id
SELECT U.*, P.* FROM Partner P JOIN User U ON P.user_id = U.user_id WHERE P.partner_id=#{partner_id}
